dialogue.htmlContent:
The tunnels of Submission have an ominous feel to them at the best of times, but as you and [npc.name] make your way down the dirty, deserted passageways, you're filled with a particular sense of dread, as though something terrible is about to happen.

At first, the sinister silence that permeates these gloomy catacombs is broken only by the rustling of litter that you and your partner disturb underfoot, but as you travel ever onwards, you start hearing faint sounds of movement coming from somewhere far behind you. Realising that you're being followed, and not wanting to be inadvertently shepherded into a trap that might be lying up ahead, you stand your ground and turn to face the direction of your pursuers.

[npc.speech(Imps...)] [npc.Name] whispers, and after just a moment, [npc.sheIs] proven right, as from around the far corner, there appear the forms of four imps. Two of these are larger than the others, and, although their wings look large enough to sustain flight, they're choosing to walk upon the ground, while the other two, smaller imps, are fluttering along in the air a short way behind.

All four of the imps are dressed in skimpy rags, and, perhaps due to the fact that they appear more comfortable flying around than walking, you notice that the two smaller imps lack any form of footwear. What catches your attention the most, however, is that all of the imps are armed with what appear to be lengths of metal pipe.

As they catch sight of you, the two alpha-imps stop in their tracks. The one on the #IF RND.nextInt(2)==0 #THEN left #ELSE right #ENDIF , who's carrying a crude-looking shield in addition to their offensive weapon, appears to be the leader, and [npc2.she] steps forwards and sizes you up, before declaring, [npc2.speech(Yer a cheeky [pc.insult], ain't yer?! Runnin' round in our territory, thinkin' you ain't gonna get caught!)]

The two smaller imps flutter forwards to back their leader up, and [npc4.name] sneers, [npc4.speech([pc.InsultPlural]! You're gonna be in for it now!)]
